title: Egret
marks: Signature, Title, Date, Inscription, Mark, Seal, a LRC, in pencil: [Mikumo]; bottom center, in pencil
description: white egret in profile looking to UL; surrounded by blue; green reeds overlapping egret at bottom half; square intaglio seal LRQ
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Shig Kizuka
